interpretation: The "scroll" card represents knowledge, wisdom, and learning. This emoji suggests that the answer to your question may be found by looking to the past, studying history, or consulting with experts. It may also indicate the need to document or record important information. This card encourages you to delve deeper into your studies or seek out new information that can help you make informed decisions. Alternatively, it may be a warning to be cautious of information that is not well-documented or researched. Overall, the "scroll" card reminds us that knowledge is power and encourages us to seek out the truth in all things.
